00135 class MainWindow: public QMainWindow, private Ui::MainWindow

00137         Q_OBJECT
00138 
00143         class QStringFromBoostVariant: public boost::static_visitor<QString>
00144         {
00145                 const MainWindow * mParent;
00146         public:
00147                 QStringFromBoostVariant(const MainWindow * p): mParent(p) {}
00148                 QString operator()(const int& i) const          { return QString::number(i); }
00149                 QString operator()(const std::string& s) const  { return QString(tr(s.c_str())); }
00150                 QString operator()(const double& d) const       { return mParent->qstringFromDouble(d); }
00151                 QString operator()(const complex& c) const { return mParent->qstringFromComplex(c); }
00152         };

00352 class LangAction: public QAction
00353 {
00354         Q_OBJECT
00355 public:
00361         LangAction(QObject * parent, const QString& fn):
00362                 QAction(parent), langFilename(fn)
00363         {
00364                 setText(tr(fn.toAscii().data()));
00365                 connect(this, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(triggeredSlot()));
00366         }
00367 public slots:
00370         void triggeredSlot() { emit triggered(langFilename); }
00371 signals:
00374         void triggered(const QString&);
00375 private:
00376         const QString   langFilename; 
00377 };
